title: Delay
author: JGray
text: Hi, everyone! Keith's present for the New Year was a fried motherboard. The new comic will be delayed a few days as he works on repairing his rig. Sorry for the lack of new pages until then. Hopefully it won't be long at all.

replies.author: Aleena*Guest*
replies.text: He bought some new components. They should arrive by Friday.

replies.author: David*Guest*
replies.text: Just wanted to check in, see how things are with you guys
